thread.section_title: FMW Fasteners Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FMW Fasteners | fmwfasteners.com
thread.title: John Taschler
thread.title_full: FMW Fasteners reviewed by John Taschler

author: John Taschler
title: John Taschler
text:
I was having difficulty locationg these bolts for a motorcycle repair. I found FMW after an online search and ordered the bolts based on what turned out to be a very accurate product photo and description. The bolts were delivered to my home in two days from Texas to New Jersey.
What a great product and a fabulous company. Thanks
